pages.text: Ta Vin rozmistyv stabilizers (hory) na zemli, lest tse padinnya z vamy, tak zhe, yak i richky ta dorohy, shcho vy mozhete keruvatysya
Ta vikhy, tak zhe, yak i zirky; shchob buty vykorystanyy dlya navihatsiyi
odyn khto Vyhlyadaye stvoryuye yak odyn khto ne stvoryuye? Chy ne mohly b vy zaraz vzyaty uvahu
Yakshcho vy rakhuyete BOZHI blahoslovennya, vy ne mozhete mozhlyvo okhopyty yikh. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Ta BOH znaye shchob ni vy prykhovuyete ta shchob ni vy zayavlyayete
Yak dlya idoliv vony zdiymayutʹsya bilya BOHA, vony nichoho ne stvoryuyutʹ; vony sebe buly utvoreni
Vony ye mertvi, ne zhyvyy, ta vony ne mayutʹ ideyi yak abo koly vony budutʹ resurrected
Vash boh ye odyn boh. Yak dlya tsykh khto ne viryatʹ v U maybutnʹomu, yikhnim serdenʹkam zaperechuyutʹ, ta vony ye zukhvali
Absolyutno, BOH znaye vse vony prykhovuyutʹ ta vse vony zayavlyayutʹ. Vin ne lyubytʹ tsi khto ye zukhvalyy
Koly vony prosyatʹsya, "Shcho roblyatʹ vy dumayete tsykh vidkryttiv z vashoho Lorda," yak kazhutʹ, "Povisti z mynuli
Vony budutʹ trymatysya vidpovidalʹni dlya yikhnikh hrikhiv na Dni Resurrection, usikh, krim hrikhiv vsi tsi komu vony pryzvedeni do pomylky yikhnim neznannyam. Shcho neshchasnyy vantazh
Inshi lyublyatʹ yikh zamyslyly ranishe, ta otzhe, BOH zruynuvav yikhnye budynok u fundatsiyi, vyklykayuchy dakh vpasty na nykh. retribution vrazyty yikh koly vony naymenshi ochikuvani
